api_list.name: Generate qr photo
api_list.description:
Generate qr photo for your bitcoin transactions, there are two required parameters: address & amount, the photo will be availlabe on: crypto.hirak.site/btc/ADDRESSAMOUNT.png
exemple: crypto.hirak.site/1BtS4rSSi12RZcNY79q7hWEUSw2L5Ach5G0.0001.png
